title: Strategy of Substitution
text: To use substitution, write the first equation in terms of $$y$$ and plug into the second equation. This writes the second equation only in terms of $$x$$.

title: Expression in terms of $$x$$
text: What is the resulting expression in terms of only $$x$$ after simplifying?

title: Factor Expression
text: To solve for the values of $$x$$, factor out an $$x$$ from both terms and use the zero product property to calculate the values.

title: Values of $$y$$
text: To solve for the values of $$y$$, substitute each of the x-values into the first equation of $$x+y=3$$ and isolate $$y$$.
